jcr:content.jcr:title: Refer A Friend Promotion
jcr:content.ogdescription: Enroll with Ohio Natural Gas on their lowest available rates and we could each earn a $25 Visa Reward Card. It's that easy! Program Terms and conditions apply. #ad

promoherobanner.description: Invite your friends to enroll and you could both earn rewards through our Refer-a-Friend program.
promoherobanner.title: Refer a Friend

offerpromotionconten.description: Receive a  {{GIFTCARDVALUE | currency : '$': 0}} VISA Reward Card instead?
offerpromotionconten.fineprinttext: * Subject to the Refer-a-Friend program (“RAF Program”) rules and terms and conditions. Offer limited to: (i) qualified new residential/commercial customers (each a “Referee”) who use a promotion code through this RAF Program to enroll in an eligible ONG price plan (each a “RAF Referee”), and (ii) existing customers who refer one or more Referees using the RAF Program (each a “Referrer”). Referrers may earn a $25 Visa® Reward Card for each Referee who: (i) enrolls on an eligible ONG price plan, (ii) provides Referrer’s Referral Code at enrollment, and (iii) begins burning gas on an eligible ONG price plan. Referrers must: have either an active or pending account with ONG when Referee begins burning gas; authenticate their ONG account; accept the RAF Program terms and conditions; and participate by using the communication methods provided (email, Facebook, and Twitter) at onlyong.com/promo-raf and as specified in the RAF Program terms and conditions. RAF Referees earn a $25 Visa Reward Card by: (i) enrolling in an eligible ONG price plan, (ii) providing the RAF Program promotion code at enrollment (and may enter their Referrer’s unique Referral Code at that time), and (iii) reaching 60 days of continuous active service with ONG on such eligible price plan. Allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Maximum award: $500 in Visa Reward Cards per person / calendar year for all ONG Visa Reward Card promotional offers. Offer valid for qualifying enrollments processed by ONG between 12/01/2017 and 06/30/2018. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Choice program through their natural gas utility company. ONG rates do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.888.466.4427, write to Ohio Natural Gas, PO Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit www.onlyong.com. RAF Referees cannot combine this offer with any other offer but may provide the Referrer’s unique Referral Code when enrolling using another ONG promotional offer. Referrers may combine this offer with their pre-existing discounts and promotions. The Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer’s terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. © 2017 Ohio Natural Gas. All Rights Reserved.
offerpromotionconten.heading: Your friend is an Ohio Natural Gas customer and thinks you should be too!
offerpromotionconten.promoheadingline1: Select your gas utility company to view your options.
offerpromotionconten.text:
The Ohio Natural Gas® Refer-a-Friend program allows current Ohio Natural Gas customers to earn up to $500 in Visa® reward cards each year when they refer their friends who enroll with Ohio Natural Gas. 

The more you share, the more you can earn!*

1. Get your Referral Code.

2. Share your Referral Code.

3. Enjoy the rewards!*

Frequently Asked Questions>

RAF Program Terms And Conditions>
